message: i have a project can i use laravel and lumen both together  ? , like make the laravel consume restful api from the lumen ... is it even possible if so is it a good thing to do ?

data.message:
That is not a good idea , if you need server side rendering then go with laravel 
Else builder an api with any of them(lumen or laravel) then consume it with a client side JavaScript framework/library like angular,vuejs or react
